title: Digimon X-Evolution
synopsis: A virtual world was created by the present-day network called the "Digital World." The "Digital Monster," which is a digital life object, was born, and the host computer Yggdrasil managed the different Digital World areas. However, it developed the X Program of fear to eliminate all Digimon in the old world and develop a new Digital World for only certain Digimon... Now, the greatest crisis ever approaches the Digital World.
voices: ['Tanaka, Hideyuki', 'Takayama, Minami', 'Nozawa, Masako', 'Ishida, Akira', 'Hirata, Hiroaki', 'Noda, Junko']
